subject: Nicole's New 'Wedding' Look
body:
Got a little hitch in your sex life, 
we can put it in the helve easily! 

Our remedy will make you really indefatigable 
lover in a wink of an eye for cheap! 

But be quick, our offer gonna expire soon! 
For details check our official website: http://www.brushsystemsgroup.com/
